title: PHPlibxml_clear_errors()Function

metadata.description: Learn about PHPlibxml_clear_errors()Function with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Example
Clear the libxml error buffer:
<?php
libxml_clear_errors()
?>
Definition and Usage
The libxml_clear_errors() function clears the libxml error buffer.
Syntax
libxml_clear_errors()
Technical Details
Return Value:
No value
PHP Version:
5.1+

★
+1
